class_notes: EMPH Students Only; Outside permission to enroll in course must be approved by EMPH leadership.
course_description: This course will introduce public health students to concepts of emotional intelligence and different leadership styles and types, including collaborative leadership and its application to negotiation and mediation. The course will present basic principles of budget and resource management.
prerequisites: PRS 500D or equivalent transfer credit  as co-requisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3429, Section #: 900, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: L. Gaydos, Status: Open
